title: Why Aren't Men Asked If They Can 'Have It All'?
teaser: PepsiCo's CEO Indra Nooyi generated buzz when she said women pretend they can have it all but really can't. Tell Me More's parenting panel weighs in on the latest entry in the work-life debate.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
